     //=================================================================================================================
    // Bounty Hunter: Shuriken Toss
    //=================================================================================================================
    "aghsfort_bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "BaseClass"                     "ability_lua"
        "ScriptFile"                    "abilities/heroes/bounty_hunter/shuriken_toss"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss"
        "MaxLevel"                      "4"

        "AbilityType"                   "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_BASIC"
        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
        "FightRecapLevel"               "1"
        "AbilitySound"                  "Hero_BountyHunter.Shuriken"

        // Unit Targeting
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityUnitTargetTeam"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
        "AbilityUnitTargetType"         "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
        "AbilityUnitDamageType"         "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
        "SpellImmunityType"             "SPELL_IMMUNITY_ENEMIES_NO"
        
        // Stats
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCastRange"              "375 425 475 525"
        "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.3 0.3 0.3 0.3"
        "AbilityCooldown"               "5"
        "AbilityManaCost"               "50 60 70 80"

        // "AbilityCharges"                "1"
        // "AbilityChargeRestoreTime"      "5"
        // Stats
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        // "AbilityModifierSupportValue"    "0.1"   // just a mini stun
            
        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityValues"
        {
            "bonus_damage"
            {
                
                "value"          "80 120 160 200"
                "LinkedSpecialBonus"    "special_bonus_unique_aghsfort_bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss+damage"
            }
           
                "speed"                 "1000 1000 1000 1000"
         
                "bounce_aoe"            "1200"
        
                "ministun"          "0.1"
         
                "range"             "375 425 475 525"
            
        }
        "AbilityCastAnimation"      "ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_1"
    }

    "special_bonus_unique_aghsfort_bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss+damage"
    {
        "BaseClass"                     "special_bonus_undefined"

    //=================================================================================================================
    // Ability: Gold Bag Fountain - gold fountain is created on cast
    //=================================================================================================================
    "generic_ability_gold_bag_fountain_250"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET"
        "BaseClass"                     "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "item_hand_of_midas"

        "IsOnCastBar"                   "1"

        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "CreateThinker"
            {
                "ModifierName"          "gold_bag_thinker"
                "Target"
                {
                    "Center"    "CASTER"
                }  
            }
            
        }

        "Modifiers"
        {
            "gold_bag_thinker"
            {
                "Duration"              "%duration"
                "ThinkInterval"         "%think_interval"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                     "CreateItem"
                    {
                        "Target"
                        {
                            "Center"    "TARGET"
                        }           
                        "ItemName"          "item_bag_of_gold"
                        "ItemCount"         "1"
                        "SpawnRadius"       "25"
                        "ItemChargeCount"   "%gold_value"
                        "AutoUse"           "1"
                        "LaunchHeight"      "300"
                        "LaunchDistance"    "?50 350"
                        "LaunchDuration"    "0.75"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
       
        
        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityValues"
        {
           
                "gold_value"            "25"
          
                "duration"              "0.75"
           
                "think_interval"        "0.075"
            
        }
    }

                "ModifierName"          "gold_bag_thinker"
                "Target"
                {
                    "Center"    "CASTER"
                    "Flags"     "DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_DEAD"
                }  
            }
            
        }

            "gold_bag_thinker"

                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                     "CreateItem"
                    {
                        "Target"
                        {
                            "Center"    "TARGET"
                        }

                        "ItemCount"         "1"

                        "AutoUse"           "1"
                        "LaunchHeight"      "300"
                        "LaunchDistance"    "?50 350"

    {
        "BaseClass"						"mars_spear"
		"AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DIRECTIONAL"
